cu.explanation_en: Setting remote_s_portc to 0, which is below the valid port range (1-65535), will cause F1-C interface binding failure and prevent DU-CU communication.
cu.explanation_zh: 將 remote_s_portc 設定為 0，低於有效端口範圍 (1-65535)，會導致 F1-C 接口綁定失敗，並阻止 DU-CU 通信。

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 0, which is below the minimum valid bandwidth, will cause downlink carrier configuration failure and prevent cell establishment.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 0，低於最小有效帶寬，會導致下行載波配置失敗，並阻止小區建立。
